name: @v4fire/cli
description: Tools for creating V4Fire blocks and pages from CLI

scripts.newversion: npm test && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run newversiongit && npm publish ./
scripts.newversiongit: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. Read more https://github.com/V4Fire/cli/releases/tag/$npm_package_version " && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin master
